agents.enter_mcp_server_url: Enter the URL of the MCP server to connect to.
agents.select_at_least_one_tool: Please select at least one tool to import.
agents.transformed_data: Transformed data (input data for next agent)
agents.reflection_prompt_placeholder: Enter the reasoning prompt to reflect on the outputs.
agents.reflection_description: When the agent return its results, a LLM can evaluate the content.
agents.agent_discovery_endpoint: This URL must return an ADR (Agent Description Record) when called using the GET method.
agents.catalog_description: Alle auf diesem System registrierten Agenten

operator.no_agents: Bitte wählen Sie einen oder mehrere Agenten im Katalog aus.

credentials.note: Aus Sicherheitsgründen können API Keys/Tokens weder angezeigt noch aktualisiert werden. Bitte löschen Sie diese entsprechend und legen sie dann erneut an

footer.mcp_tools_description: Connect to a MCP SSE server and import selected tools as agents
footer.discover_description: Simply add the URL of any agents supporting the nginA discovery specifications
footer.wrapper_description: For an easy start wrap your existing agents in a nginA discovery shell

agents.enter_agent_url: Enter the URL of the existing agent you want to wrap
agents.enter_title_description: Enter the title and description for the agent wrapper
agents.title: Title
agents.description_placeholder: Be very detailed and concise here because this text will be processed by the Agent Builder. Avoid short general descriptions!
agents.select_authentication: Select the authentication method for this agent
agents.input_json_desc: Paste an example input JSON object here OR provide a JSON schema
agents.output_json_desc: Paste an example output JSON here OR provide a JSON schema
agents.upload_icon: Upload a custom SVG icon for this agent
agents.operation_params_desc: Configure operational parameters for this agent
agents.must_be_positive: Value must be a positive number
agents.invalid_schemas: Please check you schema defintions and try again.
agents.select_required_agents: Select the agents you want to add to your workflow:
agents.no_team_agents: No agents found in your team. Please add agents to your team first.
agents.order_agents: Arrange the execution order of selected agents:
agents.drag_drop_instructions: Drag and drop the agents to change their order. The execution will start from the top of the list.
agents.use_arrows_to_change_order: Use the up and down arrows to change the execution order. Agents will be executed from top to bottom.
agents.set_agent_order: Use the arrows to move agents up or down in the sequence. The execution will start from the top of the list.
agents.no_agents_selected: No agents selected. Please go back and select agents first.
agents.error_adding_mock_agents: Error adding mock agents to the workflow.
agents.human_in_loop_coming_soon: Human in the Loop feature is coming soon!
